acidity.notes: Tangy overall, with a small glowy cherry/plum note.

sweetness.notes: Sweetness is present, but overall complexity is weak.

flavor: Clean, well-balanced, but somewhat dilute/weak (but not hollow/empty). Jewel-like plum/cherry note reminds me of the Risaralda, Colombia decaf SO I had at Third Wave.
observations: 70g bloom water aiming for 7 second swirl bloom, but got distracted trying to time swirl bloom, not vigorous enough, possibly not long enough.
actionItem: Continue with 7 second, vigorous swirl bloom. Don't use timer for now, just count the swirl bloom aloud.
